long_desc.thetext:
Invalid URLs in the documentation always redirect to http://qooxdoo.org/docs.
If a valid version was given, it would be better to redirect to the index page for that particular version so accessing http://manual.qooxdoo.org/2.1/pages/core/variants.html would redirect to http://manual.qooxdoo.org/2.1/index.html.
If possible, having an easy way to retrieve the latest version of a particular page would be great. I suggested a version switcher (like MSDN has for .net classes) on the mailing list but it was deemed too much work. A simpler way would be to do a simple redirect. So if I access http://manual.qooxdoo.org/latest/pages/core/variants.html, I would get redirected to http://manual.qooxdoo.org/1.5/pages/core/variants.html because that’s the latest version that this page exists in. This still won’t account for renames of pages but is way better than the trial-and-error of testing all possible versioned URLs until you find the last one that works.
